name: No Crooks on Christmas (itch)
description:
One snowy Christmas Eve...

There is a strange sound coming from the living room. Goblins are invading! Quick--set up defenses to stop the goblins from destroying the presents and ruining Christmas!

Instructions:

No Crooks on Christmas is a tower defense game with a fun holiday theme.

Spend star points on two types of defenders: the mighty soldier and the trusty water bucket. The solider will attack nearby goblins while the water bucket can be used to douse flames on the presents. 

The flaming presents will appear if the Christmas tree takes too much damage. The more presents you have active, the more damage over time your tree will take.

Features:
  • Play through 5 different levels
  • Develop different strategies for tower placement
  • Douse the fires with the water bucket when the presents are ablaze
  • Fun and quirky holiday theme!

Credits:

Music by Alex McCulloch: https://opengameart.org/content/christmas-special-3
